text: Hey team, looking to work with Sophie Anderson for Zambrero. Budget is approx $2,891 - need 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Facebook post, 1 x Social media takeover, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Behind-the-scenes content. 6 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 10 months. Start date: October 2025.
